Body: My glass screen in LG L90 (d405 or d405n, i don't think there's a difference other than NFC) broke.Bought a new glass screen with digitizer for d405. It looks exactly the same as the old one (hence I know it should be compatible).I've replaced it. Touch didn't work. The old one (broken one) works.I've sent it back because I thought it's damaged, they've sent me back a new one. Still didn't work (the old one still works).I've bought a new one from a different vendor... still doesn't work. The old one still works.what could be the problem here ? What should I do ?
Title: LG L90 glass digitizer replacement doesn't work. The old one works

history.Text: My glass screen in LG L90 (d405 or d405n, i don't think there's a difference other than NFC) broke.Bought a new glass screen with digitizer for d405. It looks exactly the same as the old one (hence I know it should be compatible). 1. I've replaced it. Touch didn't work. The old one (broken one) works. 2. I've sent it back because I thought it's damaged, they've sent me back a new one. Still didn't work (the old one still works). 3. I've bought a new one from a different vendor... still doesn't work. The old one still works.what could be the problem here ? What should I do ?
LG L90 glass digitizer replacement doesn't work. The old one works
